title: We are running out of unique ways to play champions
body:
AP shen is no longer possible
AP GP is no longer possible
AP Kog'Maw is just awful now, there is no reason to build AP other than possibly just a{{item:3115}} but again, this is on-hit Kog'Maw so you are AA'ing not ulting and QE'ing
Attack speed Fizz has been out of season ever since the attack speed jungle item has become close to useless with the exception of Jungle Kog'Maw
The list keeps on going, and the new champions that are coming out are so god damn singular focused that their kit offers no 'other' way of playing them, the champions are just straight out "build this, okay?" {{champion:240}} 

LoL was a lot more fun without Riot dictating what we can and can not play, with such a SOLID and UNMOVABLE meta that is forced onto the players, there is always going to be a lack of diversity. Don't get me wrong, AP shen I wouldn't really play in ranked. But you know what, it was fun as a mother fucker when I could burst down that enemy Vayne with my Q, taunt her and then give my team a 2k hp shield. It was fun, yeah.

So what I have left to troll with and actually have fun without playing meta is generally AP Jax, AD Akali, Singed jungle, anybody have any suggestions for more? Dieing to find more.

{{champion:254}} {{champion:59}}  support
{{champion:111}} everywhere
Full AD Katarina is fucking garbage.

Idk 375% AD ratio on ult compared to 250% AP ratio is pretty dope, also 60% AD ratio on W compared to 25% AP ratio. Also last hitting is easier and if you fuck up your spells you can still kill people with AAs. Only thing you mis out on is on the really good synergy with Kat Qs and Ludens.

I mean AP Kat is better but AD can still work.

So you want me to go into reason why I say it? 

The ratios mean nothing. If you decide to go AD, it means you will have to use your auto attacks, as the two AD ratios are not more powerful than the other four AP ratios. Normally this doesn't cause a problem until you look at Death Lotus. This ability is antithetical to autoattack based champions, only because you cannot autoattack while using a channeled ability. The only reason why Wukong is able to get away with this is because his ultimate is a quasi-channel, AND has its own cc. You still are able to use it even after being cc'd as well. 

Now, if we look at an AD Katarina's kit, it can be considered a mediocre pre-rework Fiora. Both need to stick to their targets to deal damage, and both had a lot of aoe potential. The problem with AD Katarina is:

AD Katarina does not have an ultimate that applies on-hit effects, nor does she have an attack speed or movement speed steroid (no, the movement speed on W isn't nearly enough). AD Katarina's ultimate doesn't give her quasi-untargetability either, nor does it make her everywhere in the enemy team at once. Her basic abilities can do that ONLY if she get's a reset. 

Moving onto that, ALL of Katarina's basic abilities do magic damage. There are no dual penetration items, so building straight up AD without any magic penetration is considered suicide. Sure, you can get Sorc. Shoes, but it doesn't help her basic ability's horrid damage. 

Lastly, she loses lots of up front damage because her Q and E don't scale with AD! She's also an assassin. If she loses any burst by putting her damage into AAs, then people will just escape.

Lol. First of all Wukong and Katarina are 2 entirely different champions. You cannot compare them, AT ALL.

Secondly, dealing both physical and magic damage is not bad at all. Let's say you get fed as AD Kat? How is the enemy teams supposed to itemize against you now since you deal both types of damage? There is a reason champs like Corki and Kog'maw used to be/are strong, there is not much you can do when they get ahead.

Also how would her ultimate (or any ability for that matter) applying on hit effects help AD Kat? Barely any AD item in the game actually gives on hit effects, and those that do give AS and you won't be getting these anyway.

>AD Katarina's ultimate doesn't give her quasi-untargetability either, nor does it make her everywhere in the enemy team at once. Her basic abilities can do that ONLY if she get's a reset.

Maybe go in at the right moment, just like you are supposed to as Kat even while playing AP?

On the contrary. I just did with their ultimates. They're similar in the fact that they both spin, have AD scalings, and deal damage over time.


I don't think you understand how inconsistent the mixed damage is. For one, her mixed damage is initially weak due to the fact of shitty scaling abilities, so you're just really reliant on autoattacks for damage here. Secondly, there's no synergy between auto attacks and her abilities except maybe Sinister Steel (this doesn't have a cast time, so you can AA and W at the same time). Thirdly, autoattacks are SLOW compared to .25 second basic ability combo that's likely to burst a squishy into a damage nuke we call her ultimate when building AP. AD simply does not have that.  Lastly, when I said something about AD Katarina's ultimate, you don't have to take it in the context of regular Katarina **when I'm comparing it to pre-rework Fiora**. I say that **explicitly**.
Full AP malphite is fun as well.
AD used to be a thing before they changed his W.

I'd rather have a champion balanced around 1 stat than a shitshow champion that is OP in certain forms leaving it's other forms completely unviable and giving the balance team a headache to choose a direction
ap {{champion:18}}

> [{quoted}](name=dynikus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=O31Voc4A,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-08-19T22:01:42.227+0000)
>
> ap {{champion:18}}

I did play AP Tristana, and it was amazing. But now it is absolutely awful. How you played AP Tristana:

E constantly to half HP, E again, ignite, ultimate and then jump on top of them. Or jump on top of them with the ultimate. Now you need to attack them like 4 times, which isn't happening in the mid lane nor the top lane and you also can't jungle with AP or you will get shat on.

> [{quoted}](name=Subject 5,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=O31Voc4A,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-08-19T22:38:11.904+0000)
>
> I did play AP Tristana, and it was amazing. But now it is absolutely awful. How you played AP Tristana:
> 
> E constantly to half HP, E again, ignite, ultimate and then jump on top of them. Or jump on top of them with the ultimate. Now you need to attack them like 4 times, which isn't happening in the mid lane nor the top lane and you also can't jungle with AP or you will get shat on.

but I mean they did that because trist e literally had no counter play against ap you would die from an E so fast lol while it was fun as heck there wasnt really much skill in the fact that you pressed E on the enemy and the enemy hasn't left

Pretty much the only effective off-builds are older champs. Newer champs are pidgeonholed pretty hard. An exception to this is probably Sion, who can reasonably run a tanky AP build. Morde also retains his hybrid identity, and as much as people hate it the "tanky assassin" trend are all off-builds that became wildly popular.

Itemization isn't as varied as it was in past seasons. As a result, there are a lot less build options to experiment with. Riot always preaches of promoting diversity, yet they find ways to effectively kill it with each new season. The only thing in this game that has truly become more diverse with each new season is the jungle. Everything outside of that has just become more stagnant. Less (permanent) maps and the lack of a sandbox mode don't really help things either.

you mean attack speed {{champion:111}} 

and ad {{champion:412}}

Nope. 
AP thresh ult hits like a truck and the passive provides infinite AP scaling.

While I do take atk speed quints and marks for juggernaut naut jg, no atk speed items are purchased. The core items are titanic, cinderhulk and booties.
My gold income determines the order of the final 3 items which are usually a steraks, frozen mallet/heart and a dead mans. 
Lacks cdr (so I take 10% scaling and hog blue buff) but it's hella fun and you've got a shit load of hp to beef up your shield+enough dmg to duel most fighters 1 on 1. But then there's vayne XD
passive is not infinite, the souls give less and less armor/ap per soul. caps out eventually.

why would you AS naut?

His w passive totally resets (as in it does not tick for damage) if your hit more than 1 a sec
have you never seen the animation? its beautiful. its like hes having a seizure

Actually i like what they are doing. This is not an RPG, and while having wide degrees of what to build is both good and necessary they should not endorse weirdass builds, since there are already 130+ champs that can do the same thing but better and most of these weird builds are shit either for you or the enemy ( i am not talking about old master yi AP, absolutely).

This is not a matter of meta, but a matter of design. Once you pose some main ponts you can pivot around them, or purposefully break some rules and see what's behind which is frankly far more interesting than having a barely supported build which is either weird or denies the enemy counterplay ( because that is the point of major of these builds aniway ).
Great thread ! I love the creativity you guys have for playing champions! Please keep posting more off Meta builds, I love playing weird shit :D

RIP
